venue.name: Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard

item.description:
Since the last round of Lightning Talks was successful, let's do it again! Do you have an interesting plugin or tool you want to show off? How about a deep dive into your favorite Grails feature? Have a cool Grails project you're working on? Anything Grails/Groovy related is welcome!

We'll be at the Broad Institute again this time, although in a different room. It will be on the second floor, and there'll be signs to direct us.

If you're planning on speaking, I encourage you to mention your topic in the comments, to prevent overlaps.

Each talk should be between 5 - 10 minutes, and I imagine there will be a total time of an hour or so, depending on the number of speakers. We'll have a sign up sheet to determine order. Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: Meeting room on the second floor. There will be signs!
item.name: Lightning Talks II
